title: Torn resignation letters
note: I'm not sure if it is a creators' slip-up, but Ayuhara-san mistakes Ozawa-san for Kudou-san and Ozawa-san doesn't try to correct that. Please don't be confused.

title: The deciding serve
note: Oyoshi and Okei are nicknames of Katori Yoshiko-san and Kudou Keiko-san respectively.

title: After victory
note: PS: around 04:17 Ooyama-san is drawn with glasses even though he doesn't wear them during the rest of the episode.

title: A promise to Shellenina
note: Unfortunately, the video quality in the latter half is rather bad, but it's the fault of the source material rather than encode. I couldn't get to the bottom of this.
